description: Angular component class for displaying a list of notes with functionalities like search, tag filtering, starring, deletion, and preview, part of a notes management application.

classes.name: NotesListComponent
classes.description: Displays a searchable and filterable list of notes, handles user interactions such as search, tag filtering, starring, deleting, and navigating to note creation or editing.

methods.name: onSearch
methods.description: Sets the search query and updates the notes service with the new search term.

methods.name: selectTag
methods.description: Sets the active tag filter and updates the notes service with the selected tag.

methods.name: toggleStar
methods.description: Toggles the starred status of a note identified by its ID.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Confirms deletion and deletes the note with the specified ID.

methods.name: newNoteLink
methods.description: Returns the URL path for creating a new note.

methods.name: editLink
methods.description: Returns the URL path for editing a specific note by ID.

methods.name: preview
methods.description: Generates a preview snippet of the note's text, truncated to 120 characters.

methods.name: fmtDate
methods.description: Formats an ISO date string into a locale-specific string.
